name: Hungry Dwelling
description:
A house is not a home without people to share it with. In "Hungry Dwelling", take on the role of an empty house and travel the neighborhood in search of people to fill it.

Keep an eye out for house-breaking bulldozers and use unique power-ups to stop them in their tracks. The more houses you fill, the greater the population of our neighborhood grows! How many houses can YOU fill?

Created in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2019 @ Pulse College Dublin.
